forward-gala-gala.name: Forward: GALA on GC, GALA on SOL
forward-gala-gala.description: SELL token for GALA on GalaChain → BUY token with GALA on Solana

reverse-gala-gala.name: Reverse: GALA on GC, GALA on SOL
reverse-gala-gala.description: BUY token with GALA on GalaChain → SELL token for GALA on Solana
